channel.title: Glitch in new Assist System! Steal Stats!
channel.description:
Dear Runescape Players,
A few days ago, Jagex released an update called the "Assist System" where players may "borrow" someone elses skills for a short period of time to perform actions they normally can't do (such as craft a fury with 30 crafting). However, here at HiTech Hate, we are always trying to exploit these new updates ever since the Construction exploit came out. For 3 months now, we could not find an exploit...until now.
The Assist System does have an exploit that lets you steal other players skills for your own use as long as you want and will only reset if you logout. For instance, you may find a level 126 with 99 slayer and want to kill Abyssal Demons for whips. Request Assistance from them, check Slayer and click Send Packet on our program. You will now have their slayer level no matter if they close Assistance or not. You may kill the Demons or any other slayer monster just as if you had 99 slayer...and continue like that until you logout.
Download: Mirror 1: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=U3DJC727 (DIRECT LINK - IGNORE WAITING TIME) Mirror 2: http://rapidshare.com/files/70747471/AssistAndSteal_HiTechHate_.zip Mirror 3: http://www.mediafire.com/?9uck6nrlywm
Screenshots: [img]http://i16.tinypic.com/86fltza.png[/img]
[img]http://i17.tinypic.com/7w4i3gi.png[/img]
[img]http://i16.tinypic.com/72itkzn.png[/img]
